dcterms:creator: Marwa Ragheb
Markus Dickinson
dcterms:description: A corpus of written essays collected from students entering Indiana University, focusing on the topic 'What Are Your Plans for Life?' The corpus includes essays from learners of various proficiency levels and native languages.
dcterms:title: Indiana University Learner Corpus

dcterms:creator: Geoffrey Sampson
dcterms:description: The SUSANNE corpus is a large-scale treebank of English text, annotated with morphosyntactic information. It was used in this study for pre-annotation purposes.
dcterms:title: SUSANNE Corpus
